story:
We are raising money to cover a permanent interactive experience in the gallery for visitors as well as a day of interactive art making with artist educator Dave English. We have designed an art making experience for exhibition visitors that will allow them to make their own assemblages to take home. We hope that this workshop will help eliminate the barrier between artists and no artists. Additionally, funding received from this campaign will cover transport of the work from Pittsburgh to Baltimore and packing materials. We have received funding to pay the artist an honorarium.

Join us for the art making program on June 13th, 2015 at 1 pm for an artist educator led experience where guests can create their own found object assemblages and collages. At Riggs gasllery, MICA graduate studio center, 131 west north avenue, Baltimore, MD. 

Please help with whatever amount you can spare! We are still lacking funding for expenses related to this exhibition and program. Thank you so much!!!


Curated by Jen Melvin, Ashley DeHoyos, Chrissie A. Miller, Nick Petr

story:
Short Summary

I’m an adult comic artist who runs my own adult comic book website that focuses on Mature big booty , curvy, and voluptuous married Milfs, Superheroines and teachers getting seduced by younger men. I plan on creating an animated series titled “The Proposition” based on my most popular character  Mrs. Rebecca Keagan which will follow her adventures as a 43 year old high school teacher who gets seduced by one of her 18 year old black senior students. Originally ashamed by her sexual acts, Rebecca is slowly drawn into a world of infidelity and lust as her husband could no longer satisfy her lustful needs. Soon her friends and family members get pulled into her new lifestyle as a slave to her new acts all while struggling to balance a life as a respectable educator and a married mother of four. 

What We Need & What You Get

In the proposed animated series I plan to start off with a 12 episode season with longer episodes which will cover the comics from my website from like “The Proposition”, “Mrs. Hani: Big Ass Lebanese Teacher”, and “The Proposition 2”. I plan on expanding on the hot and steamy sex scenes as well as expand on some to the character plots. If the target goal is hit, the funds will help pay for the excellent team of animators that I collaborate with, voice actors/actresses, and a music/sound editor. If the projected goal is exceeded then the funds will immediately go towards creating the second season of “The Proposition” animated series which will go further into the Mrs. Keagan stories way past the comics and also tie in other comics stories like “The Sleepover” and “Home Instruction” as well as introducing new sexy characters and adding in many more popular characters from the Dukes Hardcore Honeys universe. 

Faq 

What is "The Proposition" and What is it about?

The Proposition is an internet comic book series that I created in 2007 and published on my website as It follows the life of middle-aged teacher Rebecca Keagan as her life progresses from middle-class High school teacher struggling with her monthly bills into a popular internet adult star.

Where can I view the series?

The entire animated series will be shown on the website along with over 2 thousand pages of comics and art based on the series and other milf themed comics.

What will be the difference between this animated series and the webisodes on the website?

Well the web episodes were 1 to 2 minutes each where the new series it'll be 10 to 15 minutes. much longer with more story, more characters, and lots more hot Action!! The projected series will be 12 episodes and If the funding expectations exceeds or double the amount then season 2 will Immediately go into production.

Why does the series cost this amount?

Since the animated series will be longer, I will have a full group of animators working on the series in a timely fashion. There will also be a group of voice actresses performing as the female characters and someone creating the music score of the series as well as other small production expenses.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone has the means to contrubute but thats ok. Spread the word about the project and the website which will be a great help.

story:
The "Who"s of this Project? 

The Universal Art project is an open, free-to-join association of anyone who supports the idea that, through "aesthetic conversations" between artists and performers of like, as well as differing opinions and cultures, positive change can happen for us, all. 

We believe that through the free-sharing of our art, we can and will, inform and encourage others to listen to one another, and by doing so, bring compassion, egalitarianism, and peace to everyone, worldwide and literally, Universally. 

                           What we're asking for and the Important, "Why" ~

The $7,500 The Project is trying to raise will fund the renovation of our Ithaca, New York, U.S.A. working studio and soiree/performance spaces to accommodate the teaching, recording, and archiving of visual, musical, theatrical, and spoken-word art by creators of all generations, worldwide, with emphasis on giving exposure to emerging, artistic creators.

We give priority to the purchase of a specialized, high quality computer and audio/video recording equipment. This equipment will be used for creating and publishing free-access events of great variety, through our blogs, social media, and our new and unique website, which is now under construction, by and as a gift of Ithaca, New York's Cornell University.


         How, Why, and to What artists will your contributions be distributed?

We've been contacting people we are familiar with and trust, asking them for recommendations of artists, performers, and organizations who would most benefit from financial support. Our (unpaid) Advisory Committee in reviewing submissions and by mutual consent, guide The Project's resources. 

You are welcomed to send your recommendations to us. The Project promises that your suggestions and referrals will get a fair and considerable "look" by us. Whatever the outcome, you will be responded-to in a timely manner.

                                     Why you might want to Participate

You can define your belief in, and love of Art, as an effective healing agency by participating in, and contributing to The Benn Nadelman Universal Art Project. 

My entire Life's efforts have been devoted to supporting emerging visual artists, written and spoken-word authors, and a culturally broad and diverse range of performers, whose creations forward the cause of Universal Peace.

The Universal Art Project is dedicated to creating international contacts who share our mutual belief that the power of Art creates a far-reaching, aesthetic interaction and conversation between all people, all nations, and all belief systems. The Project's community, new and old friends of kindred spirit, reside throughout the Americas, Western Europe, countries of the Pacific rim, Australia and the Cape Verde Archipelago.

                                                           * * * * *

                           Kevin McCormally, Editorial Director of Kiplinger

                       Live on C-Span's Washington Journal April 11, 2015

                                                  on the formation of

                             The Benn Nadelman Universal Art Project:

                           “Benn, I commend you for wanting to do this.”

                                                               * * *

                                                  ~ Terrific Perks ~

                           for your contribution of $1 or more, including ~ 

~ Special, published Thanks from us, at the project!

~ Fine, hand-signed, museum-quality reproductions of my selected artwork. 

~ A hand-signed and inscribed edition of the hard-cover book, "Visions of Cape Anne and Cape Elizabeth".

 ~ A wonderful, personally-guided, kid-friendly tour of Ithaca, New York's Cornell University Johnson Museum, custom-designed for you and your guests.

                                                            *  *  *                                           

                                             When we reach or goal

All contributions raised beyond our $7500 goal will immediately be directed to individuals and organizations in the arts who, by example or plan, endeavor for everyone and our universal environment, to thrive.

                                                                 *

                                What happens if we don't reach our goal?                                                     

                                                        Risks and Challenges

There are often risks and head-winds when creating a public, cooperative effort. In anticipation of such ups and downs, we've been investing our personal funds and resources to insure the project's unimpeded continuation and growth.

People value transparency and we are committed to openly answering all questions, addressing any concerns, and taking a sincere and thoughtful look at your suggestions and ideas. 

The project's expenditures and income records are being overseen and guided by an independent Advisory group, at no cost to us.

                                                                * *

                                                    Other Ways You Can Help

       ~ Even if you can't contribute monetarily, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

                                                             * * * * *

                                               ~ Testimonials U.S.A. ~

"Benn is enthusiastic, personable, reliable, and very committed to the belief that the arts play an essential role in the educational development of young children." 

- Suzanne F. Hester, Executive Director of the Southern Tier Institute for Arts in Education

“It’s a wonderful body of art (Twenty-six Ways of Looking at a Blackman) and an exciting project that needs to be seen by this community.”

- Dr. Theresa Lopez Lenoure, Director of the Augusta Savage Gallery at the University of Massachusetts Amherst

Mr. Nadelman, through his warm, positive approach, combined with his enthusiasm and love of art, has provided the children with a wonderful experience and he has served as an excellent role model."

- Kathy Yen, Ithaca, New York's Northeast PTA/IC3 Enrichment Program Director

"I met Benn Nadelman, an art teacher who taught me more about life than any other. The kind of person one rarely meets in a lifetime."

- Andrew Romero-Wolf , Student at Carnegie Mellon University


                                                                   *  *  *

                              More about me and the Universal Project ~

                       My complete Biography and Curriculum Vitae (CV) 

                                  are available at no charge on Request:

                                                  Contact me Directly

                                       U.S.A. Cellular (607) 220-9144

                                   Email: NadelmanFineArt@Gmail.com

                                                            
                                                            *  *  *

                    Jim and Debbie Blake    Carmen Evenson   Taylor Famighetti

                           Andreia Tatiana Neves Leite     Yezy Lim     Emily Lloyd   

               Brandon Marshall  Todd McKenna  Laurie McMillen  Steve Mohlke

                      Deb Moore   Tim Nosewicz   Akash Nadan   Jess Nadelman

           Sara Nadelman   Jenny Pacanowski   The Tompkins ReUse Tech Team  

                    Anne Rhodes   Micky Roof   Pamela Wasserman   Candy Xiao

                                                                                       

                                                             *  *  * 

                                                         About me!

                        My complete Biography and Curriculum Vitae (CV) 

                              are available Free, emailed to you on Request.

                                                  Contact me Directly:

                                         U.S.A. Cellular (607) 220-9144

                                   Email: NadelmanFineArt@Gmail.com

                                             

                                                   Important Note!

                         The Benn Nadelman Universal Art Project is not 

                      currently, an IRS 501(c)(3) nonprofit Public Charity.

The Project is active in filing with the United States' Internal Revenue Service as a Not-For-Profit Public Charity, under IRS Section 501(c)(3) codes. 

We recommend that you check with your tax attorney or accountant to           examine the possibilities of using your support as a tax deduction.


                                                                    ~  ~  ~

                                                      The Universal Project,

                                          In Memory of Pat Stevens Nadelman

story:
WHO I AM / chi sono

Sono una fotografa fine art di Novara, ormai specializzata nelle ambientazioni oniriche e surreali. Da qualche anno espongo regolarmente e i miei lavori sono stati pubblicati internazionalmente. Tengo anche workshop e curo un blog sulla creatività.

Per me la fotografia è un mezzo per esprimere le mie visioni: voglio rappresentare un mondo in cui i colori, la natura e la magia si confondono con la realtà, come se le mie foto fossero dei frammenti di sogni.
---
I am a fine art photographer based in Novara, Italy. I am now specialised in surreal and dreamlike photography. I've been regularly exhibiting for years now, and my works have been published internationally. I hold workshops and write a blog about creativity.

Photography to me is a way to show my visions: I want to represent a world where colours, nature and magic mix up with reality, as if my photos were fragments of dreams.

THE EXHIBITION / la mostra

La mia intenzione è proporre la mostra in diverse città italiane, magari anche all'estero! Vorrei far conoscere i miei lavori tramite un'esposizione di qualità, un vero e proprio viaggio con cui condurre gli spettatori nel mio mondo onirico. Vorrei quindi realizzare delle stampe fine art di ottima qualità che valorizzino i miei lavori con colori vibranti! I fondi contribuiranno anche alla realizzazione di un catalogo con le opere esposte e all'acquisto delle cornici.
---
My goal is to present the exhibition in several Italian cities, maybe even abroad! I would like to introduce my work through an exhibition of quality, a real journey that could lead the audience in my dream world. I will then create fine art prints of the highest quality that enhance my work with vibrant colors! The funds will also contribute to the realization of a catalog with the exhibited works and the purchase of frames.

PERKS / in cambio

Sulla destra potete vedere cosa offro in cambio con ogni aiuto: spero di raggiungere l'obiettivo, e in caso contrario utilizzerò i fondi per il mio progetto, diminuendo il numero di stampe.
---
You can see on the right what I offer in exchange for any help : I hope to achieve the goal, and if not, I will use the funds for my project, decreasing the number of prints.

HOW TO HELP / come aiutarmi

Ringrazio dal profondo del cuore chiunque vorrà contribuire alla realizzazione di questa personale itinerante! Potete aiutarmi anche condividendo sui vostri facebook, twitter o altro questa pagina :)

Per conoscere meglio cosa faccio e chi sono: http://www.dianadebord.com
---
I thank with all my heart whoever wants to contribute to the realization of this itinerant exhibition! You can also help by sharing this page on your facebook, twitter, etc:)

To learn more about what I do and who I am : http://www.dianadebord.com

story:
Hi, my name is Beth Abaravich; I am a fashion designer, an artist, a teacher, and a mom.  A few years ago I took a class in silk painting, but instead of painting pastoral scenes or bouquets of flowers, I painted graphic designs often incorporating words. After that I started covering furniture and it took on a life of it’s own.  My last big piece was Altar to My Teenage Self, which I used in my portfolio for graduate school. I have been accepted to both The Art Center in Pasadena and Otis College of Art and Design.  

My campaign to raise funds for graduate school is important to me for so many reasons.  I want to engage the public and challenge myself to do so in interesting and thought provoking ways.  I think being a female artist right here and now is a huge responsibility.  Telling stories, that touch others and start conversations is the beginning. Your contribution would not only make my continuing education a possibility, it would be a huge vote of confidence.  Knowing others have placed their faith in me would definitely help push me to go above and beyond.

Art School fees and art supplies will be paid by your contributions.  All funds whether I meet my goal or not will go towards some facet of my education.  It’s my hope to share my wearable art with you in return for your contribution. 

For every $85 contribution, I will send you a “35x”35 Hand painted Scarf.  Each one is unique, and you can go to my website bethabaravich.squarespace.com and pick out which one you would like. 

For every $150 contribution, I will send you a “72 x “30 Serape Vest.  This is so cool because it can be worn as a vest OR you can pull the long side through one of the holes and wear it like a scarf.  Here also you can go to   bethabaravich.squarespace.com and pick one out. 

For every $250 contribution, I will send you a Draped Silk Vest.  These are beautiful because they can be worn one of two ways, one way it’s shorter with a draped back.  Flip it upside down, now the front is longer, with a slightly different design.  These, too, can be selected from my website.  Please keep in mind that each one is different and a work of art.

I graduated with honors when I received my bachelor’s degree, and I expect to do the same here.  The only difference is now I have two kids, so I have already started to simplify my life.  I believe that everything that seems like a hurdle is really your asset.  I’m older…so I have more knowledge and experience.  I have kids…so I know how to negotiate and edit what I say.  There is always a usable angle that can elevate instead of bring me down.

If you love what I’m doing, if you’re inspired, please share it via social media.  Let’s spread some good Indiegogo karma!

story:
My name is Rhonda Vegso, I am also known as the Drinkwater Potter.  I have been creating my pottery and teaching the art to others from a tiny single car garage that was renovated and heated.  Interest in classes has grown but my current facility is just to small to accommodate more students.  I am now offering classes to children, people with disabilities, and the general public and look forward to increased capacity on the second floor of the new building.  I have prepared myself for entrepreneurship by earning a Business Certificate and an Accounting Diploma through SIAST,

There is so much talent around and no permanent venues for people to access it. The historic building I purchased to house The Vault Arts Center and Studio Vegso, was originally the Bank of Commerce.  The 900 ft2 great room has 12' ceilings and open space perfect for a gallery providing space for artists and crafts people to showcase their work, a venue for cultural events to enrich the lives of local rural residents, as well as attracting visitors from surrounding cities and travelers.  I believe The Vault will have a profound effect on the Village of Drinkwater leading to growth of this rural community.

There is much work underway.  The shingling is complete, and natural gas installed.  Floors are being stripped with the intention of restoring the studio floor and recovering the gallery floor.  The interior walls are being patched to prepare for paint, and the exterior of the building will also be painted. Most of the work will be undertaken by me with the help of my family, friends in the community, and my students, but there is some work that will be contracted.

We need funding for upgrades to the building to get it into a functional state.  Every contribution helps and will fund the projects in this order:

1  Water service, septic and bathrooms  Cost: $20,500

2  Furnace and AC upgrade Cost: $7,500

3  Interior upgrades, paint and flooring $3,300

4  Exterior upgrades, chimney repair, wheelchair ramp and stairs, windows. soffits, facia, and paint Cost: $19,700

To show my gratitude for your contribution, the perks include Studio Vegso pottery and experiences for your enjoyment!  I hope you find something you will love in the perks section!  The pictures in the photo gallery are of previously sold work.  Brand new similar, and unique items will be made for you to choose from to fill your perks.

While a traditional business loan is an option for acquiring the funds to complete the work, I think its important to the success of this venture to both keep the payments to a minimum, and to involve a community of supporters who will have a personal interest in The Vault.  I want this to be something we can all be proud of.  Your contribution makes you a part of The Vault family of founders!

The Vault Arts Center is located in the heart of Drinkwater, Saskatchewan.  If you look up the origins of the Drinkwater name you will find a long list of hard-working people whose motto is "Labore Omnia Florent" or, with work all things flourish.   There are a lot of good people working hard to help this arts center flourish, and flourish it will!

Another important way you can help is to promote this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools to share it with your social media.  Getting the word out to others about The Vault will help find supporters now and once the doors are open!

Thank you so much for helping to open The Vault!

story:
Bonjour, Salam, Shalom, Namaste  Bienvenu(e)s à vous toutes et toutes ! 


Je vous remercie de prendre de votre temps afin de découvrir mon projet art thérapeutique d'Amour et de Paix, pour vous transmettre je l'espère, le plein d'énergie positive ;) Ojala ! Comme on dit en Espagne ;) ( Oui, je suis une grand amatrice de smiley ! Et que ce serait le web sans smiley, dites le moi ! )

Alors, je m'appelle Aida et je suis art thérapeute holistique. Mon métier, que je considère comme une vocation, un état d'être , consiste  à travailler sur l'harmonie du corps, du coeur et de l'esprit, et accompagner toutes celles et tous ceux qui en formule le désir, vers le Bien-Etre. Et manifester ainsi l'être authentique ! 

Je continue naturellement à travailler sur moi, car c'est un travail permanent, qui demande un investissement constant. Car l'extérieur, n'est que le reflet de ce que nous developpons à l'intérieur. 

J'utilise pour cela différents outils qui puisent leurs sources dans la sagesse, la sagesse de l'Unité. Et ce que j'Aime par dessus tout est distiller une énergie de d'Amour, de Paix et de Beauté et inviter chacun à découvrir ces magnifiques ressources internes.  C'est à dire un être Divin qui aspire à émerger et s'épanouir.

Je souhaite m'installer dans la ville de Cordoba-Cordoue en Espagne ,ville d'Andalousie, anciennement Coeur d'El Andalus, qui lie l'occident à l'orient et laquelle durant près de trois siècles fut la plus grande ville d'Europe et l'une des plus denses du monde. 

J'ai le coeur à développer le projet *** Wadoud ☺ Salam !!! que je vous invite à découvrir ici www.wadoudwasalam.com et consacrer notamment une recherche sur le grand théologien mystique, grand maitre du soufisme, Ibn Arabi qui déclare " L'Amour est ma religion et ma foi " et Averroes-Ibn Rushd dont les écrits lumineux invitent à chercher Dieu dans son coeur et par soi même. Et faire le lien entre spiritualité et science. Je souhaite aussi organiser diverses activités telles que des séjours, des conférences, des publications, à même de promouvoir l'histoire et la culture d'El Andalus.


Je choisis aussi Cordoue, car elle est pour moi une ville d’accueil et d'ouverture, de tolérance et de noblesse où encore aujourd'hui les cordouans évoquent avec tendre fierté les influences arabo-musulmanes ,juives et chrétiennes de leur civilisation. Mon aspiration est que Wadoud & Salam apporte sa pierre à la revivification de l'esprit de la civilisation d'El Andalus. Civilisation qui est citée en exemple tant par sa finesse, sa science que par sa tolérance, et qui a permis la renaissance de toute l'Europe.

Les fonds donc collectés me permettront également incha'Allah, si Dieu le veut, de m'installer à Cordoue et d'ouvrir un atelier d'Art thérapie holistique qui consiste au travail sur l'harmonie du corps, du coeur et de l'esprit , et qui utilisera notamment  la calligraphie à haute valeur vibratoire et les oeuvres thérapeutiques.


Auquel je consacre ces deux articles sur mon blog, que je vous invite chaleureuse à découvrir :

http://www.wadoudwasalam.com/2015/01/calligraph...

http://www.wadoudwasalam.com/2015/03/l-art-ther...



Par avance, merci pour votre soutien, 

vos contributions et votre énergie d'Amour et de Paix ;)


Aida

story:
View a thread in the Practical Machinist forum where members are reviewing our wrench.  Forum Link


Wrench stem being used in the collet chuck of a milling machine.

Wrench stem being used in a Jacobs chuck of a milling machine.

Unique Tap Wrench Description

This tap wrench was designed 100% by the staff at Northern Machining. It is like no other tap wrench on the market today. The uniqueness of our wrench comes from its ability to maintain center with the central position of the tap, which it is holding. With conventional tap wrenches, center alignment is always lost because only one jaw, which holds the tap, moves. With our self-centering tap wrench, both jaws move uniformly, thus keeping a central position no matter the size of the tap which it is holding. View pictures from a satisfied customer.

Our Tap Wrench gives inline support for taps without center holes, on a drill press or milling machine.

  • Place stem up into a drill chuck for centering over a hole and to keep both hands free to turn the wrench. (will feed the spindle down by itself instead of keeping pressure on the spindle with one hand).
  • Two sided locking pressure which doesn’t tend to loosen like conventional types.
  • Fully replaceable items
  • 100% tool steel with hardened jaws and body for long life

Background

My Name is Chad Ashley the son and employee of a machine shop owner, at Northern Machining, Inc.  in Norfolk, NY.  The business was founded in 1986 and employs 10, inside a 7000 square foot building.  Please take the time to visit Northern Machinings, Inc. website  to ensure piece of mind that you will be funding an already proven product, being manufactured by a legitimate business with world wide customers.

I personally have an entrepreneurial desire to produce and manufacture a product within our company that will sustain and even grow our business, into more of a self sufficient company rather than just relying on business coming from our current customers.

You can trust that your funding will be greatly appreciated, and you can expect a product that has been 100% designed, manufactured, and delivered from a US family owned business.  My parents are the owners, I am production manager, my sister is a machinist, and my wife is a secretary.  Take the trust and dedication that you get from a Mom and Pop store and assume that, that can be expected by us!
Campaign Summary 
1)  Primary reason for this campaign is to produce a pre-order batch without taping into the normal business funds.
2)  Hoping to have a large enough pre-order so that we can reduce the expense of setups involved.  This will allow us to reduce the overall price of our wrenches to the customers significantly, but will be proven after doing a large batch, which is too risky with our limited marketing at this time.
      a)  We are currently running our second ever batch of wrenches at a total of 50ea. which is not very large.  Hoping to get this in the relm of a 300ea. - 500ea. batch which diminishes the setup cost per wrench.
3)  Hoping to get our tap wrench in the hands of many individuals so that the quality and advantages can be seen and word of mouth helps to market future orders.
4)  We have marketing issues and we are hoping to have at least 25% of the funding go to building a dedicated website for marketing and selling online.  (currently this is part of Northern Machinings web site)
5)  Lastly we are hoping that you as funders will either possibly be in the correct market to become a distributor of our wrenches, or know someone who you can share the wrench with that may be in the tool%ing industry.
There will be an incentive for the first 50 people to fund a single wrench to receive a wrench from a batch that is currently being made.  There will be a much shorter lead time than the larger pre-order batch we are hoping to get from this funding campaign!!
What we need
1)  50% will go to the large batch manufacturing cost
2)  25% will go to a dedicated website for marketing and point of sale
3)  25% will go toward marketing efforts (ad campaigns, website optimization)
What you get
1)  Satisfaction of knowing a USA made product is being produced and marketed from your much appreciated funding
2)  Those that purchase a wrench will get a lifetime warranty product, with fully replaceable parts.
3)  A special thanks to all levels at $25 or more of funding, on our website that is built.
4)  Multiple funding and purchasing options:
     a)  No perk, just want to contribute  -  choose your amount
     b)  I want a T-shirt - $25
     c)  Skip the shirt, I want a hat - $30
     d)  Dress me up, shirt and hat- $45
     e)  Pre-order batch - $129
     f)  Want it now -  $139
     g)  Me and a friend - $240
     h)  Distributor deal - $1000
If Goal not reached
No worries, with our already in production run we will be able to satisfy tap wrench orders and start a new batch as necessary to fulfill orders.  T-shirt and Hat orders will also be filled!  This in itself is a perk for funding with a family owned business, not trying to take advantage of others money!  Your help is much appreciated and we will commit to providing you with your specific funding level perk!  
Your funding impact
Your funding either small or large will put us in fast forward, to realize that we have a large enough market to pursue expenses needed to create a dedicated website, and provide necessary funds, to provide extra marketing expenses that currently are not in use.   We know we have a superior tap wrench, with already satisfied customers, with no returns or warranty requests!
Virtually no risk or challenges
As explained a few times already, feel confident that you will be funding an already proven product, and since we are the manufacturer, we are able to fill all the perks for funding we receive.  The only challenge will be getting to busy with our regular business customers, causing delays in the manufacturing process for the pre-order batch.
Unable to contribute
If you are unable to contribute please share this funding campaign with all of your friends and family.  Please use the Indiegogo tools to share!
Thank you for viewing!
Chad Ashley
story_txt:
View a thread in the Practical Machinist forum where members are reviewing our wrench.  Forum Link

Wrench stem being used in the collet chuck of a milling machine.
Wrench stem being used in a Jacobs chuck of a milling machine.
Unique Tap Wrench Description

This tap wrench was designed 100% by the staff at Northern Machining. It is like no other tap wrench on the market today. The uniqueness of our wrench comes from its ability to maintain center with the central position of the tap, which it is holding. With conventional tap wrenches, center alignment is always lost because only one jaw, which holds the tap, moves. With our self-centering tap wrench, both jaws move uniformly, thus keeping a central position no matter the size of the tap which it is holding. View pictures from a satisfied customer.
Our Tap Wrench gives inline support for taps without center holes, on a drill press or milling machine.

Place stem up into a drill chuck for centering over a hole and to keep both hands free to turn the wrench. (will feed the spindle down by itself instead of keeping pressure on the spindle with one hand).
Two sided locking pressure which doesn’t tend to loosen like conventional types.
Fully replaceable items
100% tool steel with hardened jaws and body for long life


Background

My Name is Chad Ashley the son and employee of a machine shop owner, at Northern Machining, Inc.  in Norfolk, NY.  The business was founded in 1986 and employs 10, inside a 7000 square foot building.  Please take the time to visit Northern Machinings, Inc. website  to ensure piece of mind that you will be funding an already proven product, being manufactured by a legitimate business with world wide customers.

I personally have an entrepreneurial desire to produce and manufacture a product within our company that will sustain and even grow our business, into more of a self sufficient company rather than just relying on business coming from our current customers.
You can trust that your funding will be greatly appreciated, and you can expect a product that has been 100% designed, manufactured, and delivered from a US family owned business.  My parents are the owners, I am production manager, my sister is a machinist, and my wife is a secretary.  Take the trust and dedication that you get from a Mom and Pop store and assume that, that can be expected by us!
Campaign Summary 
1)  Primary reason for this campaign is to produce a pre-order batch without taping into the normal business funds.

2)  Hoping to have a large enough pre-order so that we can reduce the expense of setups involved.  This will allow us to reduce the overall price of our wrenches to the customers significantly, but will be proven after doing a large batch, which is too risky with our limited marketing at this time.
      a)  We are currently running our second ever batch of wrenches at a total of 50ea. which is not very large.  Hoping to get this in the relm of a 300ea. - 500ea. batch which diminishes the setup cost per wrench.
3)  Hoping to get our tap wrench in the hands of many individuals so that the quality and advantages can be seen and word of mouth helps to market future orders.
4)  We have marketing issues and we are hoping to have at least 25% of the funding go to building a dedicated website for marketing and selling online.  (currently this is part of Northern Machinings web site)
5)  Lastly we are hoping that you as funders will either possibly be in the correct market to become a distributor of our wrenches, or know someone who you can share the wrench with that may be in the tool%ing industry.
There will be an incentive for the first 50 people to fund a single wrench to receive a wrench from a batch that is currently being made.  There will be a much shorter lead time than the larger pre-order batch we are hoping to get from this funding campaign!!
What we need
1)  50% will go to the large batch manufacturing cost
2)  25% will go to a dedicated website for marketing and point of sale
3)  25% will go toward marketing efforts (ad campaigns, website optimization)
What you get
1)  Satisfaction of knowing a USA made product is being produced and marketed from your much appreciated funding
2)  Those that purchase a wrench will get a lifetime warranty product, with fully replaceable parts.
3)  A special thanks to all levels at $25 or more of funding, on our website that is built.
4)  Multiple funding and purchasing options:
     a)  No perk, just want to contribute  -  choose your amount
     b)  I want a T-shirt - $25
     c)  Skip the shirt, I want a hat - $30
     d)  Dress me up, shirt and hat- $45
     e)  Pre-order batch - $129
     f)  Want it now -  $139
     g)  Me and a friend - $240
     h)  Distributor deal - $1000
If Goal not reached
No worries, with our already in production run we will be able to satisfy tap wrench orders and start a new batch as necessary to fulfill orders.  T-shirt and Hat orders will also be filled!  This in itself is a perk for funding with a family owned business, not trying to take advantage of others money!  Your help is much appreciated and we will commit to providing you with your specific funding level perk!  
Your funding impact
Your funding either small or large will put us in fast forward, to realize that we have a large enough market to pursue expenses needed to create a dedicated website, and provide necessary funds, to provide extra marketing expenses that currently are not in use.   We know we have a superior tap wrench, with already satisfied customers, with no returns or warranty requests!
Virtually no risk or challenges
As explained a few times already, feel confident that you will be funding an already proven product, and since we are the manufacturer, we are able to fill all the perks for funding we receive.  The only challenge will be getting to busy with our regular business customers, causing delays in the manufacturing process for the pre-order batch.
Unable to contribute
If you are unable to contribute please share this funding campaign with all of your friends and family.  Please use the Indiegogo tools to share!
Thank you for viewing!
Chad Ashley

story:
LOVE PAPER by Lei

Hey, I am Lei . I am born in Tianjin, Mainland China and live since over 15 years in the beautiful city of Cologne in Germany. Together with some German and Chinese friends we developed the idea of LOVE PAPER.

We love paper because it is so versatile and sustainable. In my country of birth China, people are working a lot with paper because it is very flexible and with a bit of color, it brings much joy in every day. Sometimes I miss that in Germany. Colorful small gadgets that enchant the everyday life. That’s the reason why we developed LOVE PAPER, the magic Paper to make every day to an happy day, with  colorful love. There are so many opportunities  every day.

+++

Hallo, ich heiße Lei und komme ursprünglich aus Tianjin in China und lebe seit 15 Jahren in Köln (Deutschland). Zusammen mit meinen Freunden haben wir LOVE PAPER entwickelt.

Das möchten wir Euch gerne vorstellen. Wir lieben Papier weil es so vielseitig und nachhaltig ist. In meinem Geburtsland  China arbeitet man sehr viel mit Papier, da es sehr vielseitig einsetzbar ist und  mit ein wenig Farbe viel Freude in den Alltag zaubert. Das vermisse ich manchmal in Deutschland. Farbige Kleinigkeiten, die den Alltag verzaubern . Deshalb haben wir LOVE PAPER entwickelt; das besondere PAPIER,  das Dich jeden Tag mit Liebe begleiten kann.

+++
Do you know this situation? Somebody invites you for dinner and you want to bring a small gift with you. A bottle or some flowers or whatever. You find it, but it´s " naked". No nice packaging material at home to make your present more  impressive.  Imagine  the great feeling if you are able to pimp up your present without any effort within seconds? No hazel or headache and your amazing present is ready for a wonderful dinner. Yep- you can get it :-)

+++

Ihr kennt das Problem? Du bist eingeladen und bringst  schöne Blümchen oder eine Flasche mit. Aber das einfach so „ NACKT“? Wie wäre es, wenn Du (einfach)Dein Geschenk   pfiffig verpackst und somit zusätzlich aufwerten könntest. Und das sozusagen im Handumdrehen.

+++

LOVE PAPER

-the versatile multi-artist!

-die  vielseitigen Multikünstler


LOVE PAPER is high valuable Paper Products made of renewable raw material. After use you can recycle it easily. The papers we use are dyed through, with non-toxic, ecofriendly economic colors, so they can develop their full brilliance of colors. entfalten. My friends in China, who are involved in the development, produce LOVE PAPER with a lot of care and love. The production is not easy. Each sheet of paper is glued on  68 points, with the next loop precisely. So that’s the way we get this wonderful honeycomb effect. They have to repeat this procedure approx. 250 times to get the stack for the LOVE PAPER.

+++

LOVE PAPER sind hochwertige Papier Produkte, die aus nachwachsenden Rohstoffen hergestellt werden. Die von uns verwendeten Papiere sind mit ungiftigen, umweltfreundlichen Farben durchgefärbt, sodass sie ihre volle Farbenpracht entfalten. Meine Freunde fertigen LOVE PAPER in China.  Das ist gar nicht so einfach. Jeder einzelne Bogen  Papier wird an 68 Stellen mit dem nächsten Bogen verklebt, damit  dieser wunderbare Wabeneffekt entsteht.  Ca. 250  Bögen Papier werden so  miteinander verbunden. Die Bögen  müssen nun entsprechend trocknen, damit sie ihre Stabilität bekommen, bevor sie  mit einer entsprechenden Form gestanzt werden. Sind sie gestanzt und an beiden Enden mit der Klebefolie versehen, kann aus ihnen nun  sehr einfach ein zauberhaftes Objekt entstehen.  Wenn Du nun LOVEPAPER von beiden Seiten zusammenführst und durch abziehen der Klebestreifen miteinander verbindest,  entsteht Dein eigenes kreatives Objekt.

+++

The sheets must dry now approx . 24 hours accordingly so that they get their stability. After the raw material is dried, the will be punched to get her shape. With the last step they get an adhesive foil to make the final assembling very easy. Please check my short video clip.



Dive into the creative magic of colours,forms and ideas.

LOVE PAPER gives you the free space to the way of your creativity. Whether as a decoration element, quality packaging, nice gadget or smart summer hat. With LOVE PAPER, you attract the attention of your friends . GUARANTEED :-) 

Right now we produce LOVE PAPER with  12 actual trend colors and 5 candy color combination. In the way of creativity, there are no limits with LOVE PAPER. I am sure in future we will provide a lot more varieties. That’s your task: LOVE PAPER is open for new ideas and inspiration. Visit  www.love-paper.com  and check the latest news and ideas.  The LOVE PAPER Community will vote for the next products and you can participate directly here with Indiegogo.

+++

Tauche  ein in den kreativen Zauber von Farben und Formen und Ideen.

 LOVE PAPERgibt Dir  die Möglichkeit, Deiner Kreativität freien Raum zu lassen. Ob als Deko-Element, wertige Verpackung oder pfiffiger Sommerhut. Mit LOVE PAPER ziehen die  Aufmerksamkeit Deiner Umgebung an. GARANTIERT :-)

LOVE PAPER gibt es aktuell in  12  Trendfarben sowie  5 „ Candy“-Farbkombinationen. Da PAPER LOVE der Kreativität keine Grenzen setzt, bin ich sicher, dass es bald noch viel mehr Formen davon geben wird. PAPER LOVE  liebt neue Ideen. 

+++


Thats the trend colors for the start. 

+++

Das sind die neuen Trendfarbe zum Start?  

+++

Whats your favorite color?


Our Candy Color Selection 1-5




So kommt Farbe auf Deinen Schreibtisch. Zuhause oder im Büro.  Mit wenigen Handgriffen  erstellst Du selbst Deine Kulibox, Schale oder Unterlage . So kommt ganz einfach Farbe in Dein Leben. :-)


Enjoy Color on your desk

At home or in your office.  Invite  colors  to your next. With a few simple steps, you can create your pen box, tray or pad. So color in YOUR life comes easily. :-)You like color on your desk. At home or in the Office. With a few simple steps you can create your pen box, tray od pad. So color comes in your life easily.

LOVE PAPER  gift packaging

Sometimes everything has to go fast and shall  look good. Difficult? Not really.  With PAPER LOVE you're doing a sensual object from a filthy bottle. Or you buy some candy as an exceptional additional decoration. Let yourself inspire by the following examples and become creative.  Post your ideas on Facebook and join the Love Paper Community.Color up your gift or...Present it impressive.

+++

LOVE PAPER Geschenk- Verpackung

Manchmal  muss es schnell gehen und trotzdem alles Top aussehen. Schwierig? Nicht wirklich. J  Mit LOVE PAPER machst Du aus einer schnöden Flasche ein sinnliches Objekt. Oder Du spendierst ein paar Süssigkeiten eine aussergewöhn-liche Dekoration. Lass Dich von den  nachfolgenden Beispielen inspirieren und werde selbst kreativ. Poste Deine Ideen auf Facebook  und gewinn mit.

Mein Tip: LOVE PAPER ist nicht nur  dekorativ. Im Sommer schützt Dich LOVE PAPER ganz einfach als Sonnen-Hut, spendet Dir Schatten und sieht auch noch toll aus. Deine Beschenkte/r wird Begeistert sein. J

+++


Color up your gift or present it impressive or fancy and sweet. Your imagination is the limit with LOVE PAPER.


My Tip: LOVE PAPER is not only a nice decoration. In summer LOVE PAPER simply protects you as a Sun Hat, shades you and looks even more amazing. Your donee  will be thrilled.

COOL Candle with Magenta Robe


or  gift sleeve for bottle, ..or do prefer sweets plate. What ever you imagine make it true with LOVE PAPER.


PAPER LOVE  FLOWER POWER

If there is something  I like almost as much as paper, that’s  flowers. Maybe because they are also so beautiful, cute and colorful. But the packaging is mostly hideous. Ugly paper or environmentally-unfriendly plastic foil.

With LOVE PAPER you get an impressive arrangement easily from any bouquet /pot. View the example images or my video clip right on and get creative by yourself.  By the way: Flowers are usually quickly withered. LOVE PAPER provides an additional long pleasure as a decorative element or as stylish solar shading.

+++

PAPER LOVE  Blumen-Schmuck

Wenn es etwas gibt, was ich fast genauso sehr mag wie Papier, so sind das Blumen. Vielleicht weil sie auch so schön hübsch und bunt sind. Doch die Verpackung ist meistens scheußlich. Hässliches Papier oder umweltunfreundliche Plastikfolie .

Mit LOVE PAPER arrangierst Du  im Handumdrehen aus jedem Blumenstrauß – oder  -Topf  ein eindrucksvolles Arrangement.  Schau Dir die Beispiel-Bilder oder meinen Video Clip an  und werde selber kreativ.  Übrigens:  Blumen sind meistens schnell verblüht. LOVE PAPER bereitet länger  Freude als Deko-Element oder als stylisher Sonnenschutz.

++++



LOVE PAPER  Sun Protection with fun & style 
When it gets really hot in summer, you can quickly sunburn in the face. With LOVE PAPER it is simple to protect you. LOVE PAPER shades you and is breezy by the fine structure. It also looks even more amazing. You're not sweating under  this kind of hat and nothing happens to your hairstyle.
  

+++

LOVE PAPER  Sonnenschutz der Spass macht

Wenn’s im Sommer richtig warm wird, ist ein Sonnenbrand im Gesicht oder ein Sonnenstich ganz nah.  Mit LOVE PAPER schützt Du Dich ganz einfach, denn LOVE PAPER spendet Dir Schatten und es sieht auch noch toll aus. Da LOVE PAPER ganz leicht ist und die Waben Struktur prima die Luft durch lässt,  schwitzt Du nicht wie unter anderen Hüten und Deiner Frisur passiert auch nichts.  

Ich verrate Euch ein Geheimnis: Es gibt 2 Möglichkeiten, PAPER LOVE als Hut zu verwenden. Drückst Du  Paper Love oben zusammen, ergibt sich die Form  wie Du sie bei Luci mit Candy 4 siehst. Du kannst natürlich auch nur einfach so  rein  schlüpfen wie auf den anderen Bildern dargestellt. Dann hast Du  den normalen Style. Check mein Video J

+++

  

Shall I tell you a secret?

There are 2 ways to use LOVE PAPER as a hat. Press the top side of LOVE PAPER together. Another shape, like in the picture outside right is born. Of course you can simply slip in your PAPER LOVE as shown in the other pictures - that’s the regular style. https://youtu.be/k5yxIPGV7-s




MY exclusive invitation for my dear  LOVE PAPER friends

LOVE PAPER is new in Europe. My friends and me are very curious whether you will  like LOVE PAPER  and how creative you apply it. That´s why we are looking forward for your exciting emails, posts and tweets. The production is by heart and connected with a lot of manual work. My colleages in China have however  very well prepared everything and are highly motivated.  

Samples are ready and the first production is on track. 

We start to build up an distribution network , to serve you more easily with the latest LOVE PAPER.  For the future we expect  a retail price in the marked from around 10 USD/each. 

Our exclusive invitation for LOVE PAPER friends with INDIEGOGO according to the wisdom  of Albert Einstein :  "Happiness is the only thing that is doubled when you share it."  Let's share the LOVE PAPER with our friends.  Check our Perks for friends.

+++

Meine Exklusiv Angebote  für LOVE PAPER Freunde

LOVE  PAPER ist neu in Deutschland. Meine Freunde und ich sind sehr gespannt, ob Ihr LOVE PAPER  mögt und wie kreativ Ihr damit umgeht. Deswegen freuen wir uns auf Eure Mails, Posts und Tweets. Wir sind dabei, ein Vertriebsnetz aufbauen, damit  Du LOVE PAPER  demnächst überall bekommen kannst. PAPER LOVE ist ein hochwertiges Produkt, das in einem aufwendigen Verfahren erstellt wird. Der Verkaufspreis im Handel wird in Zukunft zwischen 5,00-10,00€ pro Stück liegen.

Als LOVE PAPER- Freund machen wir Dir bei INDIGOGO ein besonderes Angebot.

Der Nobelpreisträger  Albert Einstein sagte einmal: „Glück ist das Einzige, was sich verdoppelt, wenn man es teil“. Dann folgen wir doch einfach seiner Idee.

+++

Production Timeline

We check continuously the status of the campaign  and start buying raw material may 2015   as early as possible.

We will start the  production according to the placed orders end of may 2015.

INDIeGOGO  Campaign  ends  middle of June 2015.

We  start shipment asap the Indiegogo campaingn is  finished with the  EARL BIRD orders and continue with the further orders rapidly.


MY PERKS FOR LOVE PAPER LOVER

LOVE PAPER Candy-Pack  ( EARLY BIRD)

YOU catched the EARLY BIRD  and  get one of each CANDY Model, in total 5 items and save with the EARL BIRD up to 60%. Dive into Colors!

 ATTENTION- The EARLY BIRD  is Limited to 200 Sets.

Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.


You too late for the EARLY BIRD? LOVE PAPER Candy-Pack  ( Unlimited) comes for YOU. You get one of each CANDY Models in total 5 items and save up to 40%.


Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.


Share you LOVE  with LOVE PAPER.  We support you with an additional discount of 50% for the 2nd set.You will receive  2 Sets of every LOVE PAPER CANDY. In total 10 items.

Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.


You like the latest TREND COLORs. This PERK provides you a complete Set of LOVE PAPER  with the latest  Trend Colours . You receive every color 1 time , so you can design or dress up on your mood.  In total 10 items. With  this ERALY BIRD You  save up to 60 %. But ATTENTION- The EARLY BIRD  is Limited to 200 Sets.

Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.




You like the latest TREND COLORs. This PERK provides you a complete Set of LOVE PAPER  with the latest  Trend Colours . You receive every color 1 time , so you can design or dress up on your mood.  In total 10 items. With  this PERK  you  save up to 50 %. 


Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.




You like the latest TREND COLORs. And you have allready your favorite  color?This PERK provides 10 Set of LOVE PAPER  with YOUR  FAVORITE Color . You receive In total 10 items from the same colour. Mixing is not possible . With  this PERK  you  save up to 50 %. 


Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.

Make sure that that you notice with your order the particular color according to this Pantone specification.



Share you LOVE  with LOVE PAPER.  We support you with an additional discount of 50% for the 2nd set. You will receive  2 Sets of every LOVE PAPER CANDY. In total 20 items.


Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.




YOU want it all!

LOVE PAPER LOVER is  1 item each of the complete Collection 2015. ALL TREND COLORS & Candys in one Pack in total 15 pieces.


Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.



Thanks for joining LOVE PAPER .  Beautiful Color and a lot of fun comes to you. Maybe a new highlight in your shop. The LOVE PAPER BUSINESS PACK  is your instant business pack . You receive from all TREND COLORS & Candy LOVE PAPER 5 items and you can start your business directly. 

Please note this offer is LIMITED to 50 PACKS.


Please add the shipping- fee according you destination in the section additional payments next to your chosen Perk.

story:
Mission Statement: 

Art Blitz aims to be a creative mecca that empowers grass roots artists to showcase their work, share it with the greater Rochester community, and to stimulate creative, collaborative, and economic growth.


For this years event we plan on making it bigger and better than ever!  In order to do so we need your help.  We need your support in purchasing stage equipment, microphones, amps, decorative supplies,  and permits.  With these items purchased we can bring a higher quality event for the greater Rochester, MN area.  Rochester, MN has an amazingly diverse population of creative people.  It is thanks to ArtBlitz that for one night we will make history and showcase their talents!  Thank you for your support and help!

For this years event we plan on making it bigger and better than ever!  In order to do so we need your help.  We need your support in purchasing stage equipment, microphones, amps, decorative supplies,  and permits.  With these items purchased we can bring a higher quality event for the greater Rochester, MN area.  Rochester, MN has an amazingly diverse population of creative people.  It is thanks to ArtBlitz that for one night we will make history and showcase their talents!  Thank you for your support and help!

story:
We are Chinese artists providing calligraphy artworks to tattoo shop and tattoo lovers , we're now raising a fund to build our new design studio.


NOTICE: Now our main perks are Special Custom Pack A, B & C, you can get custom Chinese calligraphy tattoo designs much lower than usual prices, check out right side!

http://theinkzenmaster.org/calligraphy-tattoo-gallery/




The Ink Zen Master designs tattoo patterns and artwork materials, perfectly mixes ancient art in modern life.

Our works include different types of Chinese calligraphy art , satisfy these three requirements of people:




To Tattoo Artist: Tattoo Designs Collection

Creative works of Chinese calligraphy tattoo has been focusing on in recent years, which contain aesthetic shaping of its uniqueness.

Our design collection can be inspiration of Chinese calligraphy tattoo for you, to help you get into the creative realm you've never cross.



To Tattoo Lover: Tattoo Design Patterns

Real Chinese tattoos are not just text, and more totem-like beautiful images. Our design gallery is like your secret treasure,

Digging up in it allows you to have a unique and beautiful tattoo.



To Designer: Application Materials

As an material of art for image editing, Chinese calligraphic elements have had a place already in eastern.

We provide material library for applications directly, which makes you easily will be able to create beautiful Chinese style images.




We are a dedicated team creates Chinese calligraphy images, our works are not just texts, but images made of letter art which offer special solutions to meet modern demands.


In 2008, three Chinese calligraphy enthusiasts met at college, decided to create together with mutual passion to art.

In 2013, they collected several-year-create-experiences into The Ink Zen Master, started to exchange with art lovers around the world.

Through focusing on Chinese calligraphy image creation, The Ink Zen Master have built a great-taste community,

Many tattoo artist, tattoo lovers, and designers became a part of us.




We have over 50 calligraphy tattoo designs here and more than 150 articles to introduce Chinese tattoos here, The Ink Zen Master's Twitter posts our latest creations and news every day.





We enjoy making Chinese calligraphy tattoo, also desire to create more professional work, but stock in limited manpower and equipment, our work's growth has reached a bottleneck.


We don't want to stay at this level.


Now, The Ink Zen Master is going to play something big, we want to set up a complete studio and expand recruiting.

Join our community, with your help, we will be able to achieve this great goal.




1. Fundraising via Indiegogo


Everything starts from here, we have calculated the funds we need of each equipment, the total number is USD $6,240 , with this money, we will be able to start setting up our studio.

2. Purchasing equipment


We need specialized graphic computers, SLR cameras, pen tablets, a color laser printer, special supplies, and miscellaneous outsourcing, these devices will be used to help us improve the degree of completion of artworks.

3. Improve the work


Once the equipment is right in place, we will upgrade the work in about one month, fixes some shortcomings due to lack of equipment,

this work will make our work reach high enough level to sell.

4. Launching


Time To Market! We will set up a professional platform to show the latest tattoo patterns, design artworks and application materials.

5. Start cash flow


Start selling will drive cash flow, in this step, our aim is to expand it until we can recruit.

6. Recruiting


We need talent people and staff help us to improve all aspects, after increasing the size of the team, we will be able to focus more on calligraphy tattoo art creation.

7. Establish the studio


Finally, we established a complete set of studio, make 7-year dream come true: with creation, make Chinese calligraphy fit into modern life.




The investment ratio is as follows:





Below $4,000


We'll use the money to improve the degree of works, but the result will not be too significant.


Between $4,000 to $6,240


Graphic computers and a color laser printer will be rented, but we can still finish the project.


Between $6,241 to $10,000


Plan is fully completed, we establish the studio earlier than scheduled.


Exceeds $10,000


We'll start developing The Ink Zen Master App in advance... this is supposed to start after few months!





In order to build the Studio, we will need your help.

Ways in which you can help us:


1. Donate: This is the most powerful help, without your help, we can not do this.

Please help us to continue to go down this road of creation, we will create much more great works for you in the new studio.


2. Buy Perk: Only sponsorships would be nice, but we would like to give you some feedback.

So we've designed a series of wonderful perk, you can not only help us but also get The Ink Zen Master's works & thanks!


3. Share:  It's OK if you can't really be our sponsor, but if you do like our work, retweet on Twitter or Facebook for us, or share!


Click "Tweet" or "Share" on the top of page, or copy the bold texts below and paste it into your post, so that more people can see our campaign, join the campaign together!

Help @TheInkZenMaster build #TattooDesign studio! http://igg.me/p/1067795/x/9493788


The Ink Zen Master can keep designing is because of strong support of people like you who care about the artistic quality of life, and turning it into practical action.

Thanks for backing this project, when you doing this, you're not only purchasing some pretty cool goods but also doing something great for your own life.



Q: Where can I see more of your work?


A: You can click "Gallery" on the top of the page, which introduces our tattoo designs. You can also go to http://theinkzenmaster.org/calligraphy-tattoo-gallery/ , here is the gallery of a complete edition of our works.


Q: What kind of studio will be?


A: This would be a 4-6 people's studio, specifically creates Chinese calligraphy image art, tattoo designs and applied materials mainly.

Used purely as for creation, no open stores, but we will post our works and studio guide randomly!


Q: When will I get my awesome perk?


A: If it is a perk of tattoo designs, you will receive the reply in the 24hr after order, if you need custom tattoo designs, the entire process will be completed within a few days.

If you have selected a high-spec perk, we will make new product specifications upon completion of the new studio,, you will receive them in May 2015 (the App perk is in June.)


Q: How to see the specifications of tattoo designs?


A: You can link to websites provided in Gallery, we have introduced detailed specifications of each painting there.

$14.62 grade Chinese Calligraphy tattoo design    Sample Here

$18.34 grade Chinese Calligraphy tattoo design    Sample Here

$24.14 grade Chinese Calligraphy tattoo design     Sample Here


Q: What perk can I choose its content myself?


A: Yes, if you are buying a custom tattoo designs, we will send you a note and questionnaire, and at once begin making depending on your form.

In addition, the "Special Chinese Tattoo" perk gives you six special color-tattoos designs, you are free to choose one of them.


Thanks again for your support, and don't forget, our purpose is: To Establish a new The Ink Zen Master Tattoo Studio, keep moving on our creative path, and provide higher levels of works to you!


-The Ink Zen Master

story:
It All Started With A Flamingo...

The World Famous Blue Flamingo Cafe & Gallery, in Beautiful Key West Florida, is the brain-child and dream of artist Vito DiCantante and his partner Cynthia.

"I've always wanted to open a cafe that had a really great, creative vibe to it," Vito said recently, "with The Blue Flamingo Cafe we are creating that and more."

Located at Mile Marker 2 in Key West, The Blue Flamingo is slated to not only be a cafe but also an Art Gallery, a small Performance Venue, and a "Wedding Chapel."

"We needed a gallery space for Vito's art.  He's going to also be bringing in art from fellow artists... friends whose work he admires as well," Cynthia said, "but Vito's also a vocalist, so when we began our dream... well, we had to have a stage too!"

And what's all this about a "Wedding Chapel"?  

"Well," Vito laughs, "I... well, we... have long been proponents of marriage equality, and with the Florida ban on same sex marriage ending on my birthday... and having been an ordained minister for about 10 years now... It just seemed to be a sign that we should offer that service as well."

What We Need & What You Get

As Starving Artists chasing our dream, we need Help with it all...

Construction costs for the "build out", Display Shelves and Fixtures, Coffee Equipment, Paint, Signage... The Works!

All of the funds raised will go into making The World Famous Blue Flamingo Cafe & Gallery the #1 Cafe & Gallery at "The End of America"... and a Great Place to Visit when You Come to Key West!

As an Incentive to You to Become "One of the Flock" we are offering Limited Edition Perks that have been Designed EXCLUSIVELY for This Project... and hand signed by the artist.  (see Perks for Details)

The Impact

We are putting every last dime we have into The World Famous Blue Flamingo Cafe! I even cleaned out my retirement accounts...

While we have enough to cover the vast majority of our expenses, there is always "The Unknown" and "The Other Permits/Taxes" that spring up without warning. That's why we need your help.

We want, and need, to have our family and friends support... We Need You to Become "A Member of the Flock" and Support The Arts and a Damn Fine Cup of Coffee at a Reasonable Price!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Share Our Project with Friends, Family, your Mailman, your Nail Tech, the bag boy at your Local Grocery Store... Anyone who Loves Funky Art and a Great Cup of Coffee!  And if you're going to be in the Key West area anytime over the next 90 days, stop by... We'll be more than happy to hand you a paintbrush! Thanks for your help in making The World Famous Blue Flamingo Cafe a reality!

As an Incentive to You to Become "One of the Flock" we are offering Limited Edition Perks that have been Designed EXCLUSIVELY for This Project... and hand signed by the artist.  (see Perks for Details)

While we have enough to cover the vast majority of our expenses, there is always "The Unknown" and "The Other Permits/Taxes" that spring up without warning. That's why we need your help.
We want, and need, to have our family and friends support... We Need You to Become "A Member of the Flock" and Support The Arts and a Damn Fine Cup of Coffee at a Reasonable Price!    Other Ways You Can Help Share Our Project with Friends, Family, your Mailman, your Nail Tech, the bag boy at your Local Grocery Store... Anyone who Loves Funky Art and a Great Cup of Coffee!  And if you're going to be in the Key West area anytime over the next 90 days, stop by... We'll be more than happy to hand you a paintbrush! Thanks for your help in making The World Famous Blue Flamingo Cafe a reality!

story:
Who We Are

Hello from your future arts administrators! Student Arts Managers (SAM) is dedicated to promoting the arts in an organized business manner, and to providing a venue for Arts Administration students at Savannah College of Art and Design to gain hands-on field experience. Every year, the Arts Administration department at SCAD looks forward to a student experience: attending American University's Emerging Arts Leaders Symposium in Washington, D.C. and Americans for the Arts' Arts Advocacy Day. Without funding, it will be impossible for SAM’s 15 students and 2 professors to afford this amazing trip. (We are not just a group of people who are incredibly passionate about the arts, we are the future of the arts and its public survival.) Help us, your potential arts managers, go to D.C. to meet fellow professionals, learn more about current arts topics, and of course, advocate for the arts!


What We Need

We need to make $3,500 through this campaign to go on our 3rd annual trip to Washington D.C. to participate in American University's Emerging Arts Leaders Symposium (EALS) on March 22nd and the Americans for the Arts' Arts Advocacy Day (AAD) on March 23rd-24th. This trip to D.C. will let club members network with emerging students arts leaders and professional arts administrators, plus meet congressional representatives to advocate for governmental arts funding.


How You Can Help

Your donation goes towards covering:

  • Registration fees for 15 people ($135 per person)

    • The National Arts Action Summit - $,1,125

    • The National Arts Summit Lunch - $375

    • Emerging Arts Leaders Symposium - $465


  • Accommodations for 15 people

    • Hotel - $3,971

If we do not reach our entire goal we plan on using funds for assisting in the coverage of one or both of the registration fees associated with the summit and symposium.

  • $3,500 sends 15 students and 2 professors to D.C

  • Perks include: photos and postcards from D.C, a photo with the donor photo-shopped in with our group, personalized handmade items, sketches, and narratives

If we surpass our goal, we will be able to send more SAM members to D.C., plus set aside more money for next year’s trip.

A Bit More Info

The 2015 Emerging Arts Leaders Symposium will feature dynamic speakers and panelists from around the country. Every year, the EALS invites excellent experts to discuss unique arts management issues. Emerging arts leaders learn from them, and can then better tackle the arts landscape of the future.

SAM students who attended the Symposium and Advocacy Day last year received internship opportunities and job prospects, plus several were able to meet their congressional representatives. Arts Administration students have gone on to intern with the DC Commission on the Arts and Humanities, receive invitations to the Getty Leadership Program, are featured in top publications such as the Washington Post, and work for the Florida Grand Opera. SCAD Arts Administration students are doing big things around the world, and we want you to be a part of our journey to become the next great arts administrators!

Every year, SAM raises funds to send students to take part in this great opportunity. In the last two years, the club met 100% of its fundraising goals through Indiegogo, doughnut sales, and other fundraising channels.  Let’s make that happen this year as well!


Other Ways to Help Out

Can't donate money? Or want to do more? Here are some other ways to help:

  • Like our page on Facebook: SCAD Arts Administration Department

  • Post our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and all your social media sites! Talk about us to your friends. Spread the word!

  • If you’re in Savannah, buy a Krispy Kreme doughnut from our doughnut fundraising drive. To find out where and when we’ll be selling doughnuts, email us at sam@scad.edu.

story:
Humans of the world


Nous faisons un livre cartonné livre en édition limitée des caricatures qui circulent en l'honneur de la liberté d'expression.

Touched by the outpouring of LOVE for the fallen victims associated with the Charlie Hebdo tragedy, the slain who were advocates of free speech and champions of what is right in the world, Evoked a sense of community and justice in cartoonists, artists, journalists and lay-men alike through the sharing of pictures in honour of and in the spirit of Charlie Hebdo all under the hash-tag Je Suis Charlie #JeSuisCharlie.

I am Charlie soon became Nous Somme Tous .. .. We are all Charlie.

So as a dedication to this all too often unseen LOVE and togetherness felt by many in the world we have decided that the moment should be captured, and what better way than in a collection of art designed specifically for the slain, and not just the slain for everyone who has been touched by this horrible event may good come out of it and not the legacy that the perpretrators want.

So a hardback colour limited edition book it is conyeying the sentiment of the world at this time of togetherness.

And .. .. WE NEED YOUR HELP ☺☺☺

My friend is a college professor of graphic design and a cartoonist also, and I .. .. well my talents lie in the organisation of others' talent (if that is a talent). My background is business strategy and marketing and I have worked on various projects such as this in my life and ALL have been successful including fundraising for Chernobyl childrens charities and assisting in raising €30k for a sight saving operation in China for a young girl. I am a business owner so can devote all the time I need to this and have no doubt it will be a huge success.

There are some great perks (is that still the lingo ? .. .. perks) for donating, so it really is UP TO YOU, I am willing to put the hours in if you are willing to put some euros in.

The profits are going to go to the families of the Charlie Hebdo massacre with a little set aside in aid of a few FREE SPEECH CHARITIES. Let some good at least come out of this incomprehendible madness and show evil that we will carry on, I thank you in advance.

#JeSuisCharlie
Christopher Duffy
08/01/2015

Les humains du monde

Touché par l'effusion d'amour pour les victimes tombées associés à la tragédie Charlie Hebdo, les morts qui étaient partisans de la liberté de parole et les champions de ce qui est juste dans le monde, a évoqué un sentiment de communauté et la justice dans caricaturistes, artistes, journalistes et laïcs -men semblables à travers le partage de photos en l'honneur de et dans l'esprit de Charlie Hebdo tout sous le hash-tag Je Suis Charlie #JeSuisCharlie.
Je suis vite devenu Charlie Nous Somme Tous .. .. Nous sommes tous Charlie.
Donc, comme une dédicace à cette trop souvent invisible AMOUR et la solidarité ressentie par beaucoup dans le monde, nous avons décidé que le moment doit être capturé, et quelle meilleure façon que dans une collection d'art conçu spécifiquement pour les morts, et pas seulement les tués pour tout le monde qui a été touché par cet horrible événement peut bien se en sortir et de ne pas l'héritage que les auteurs veulent.
Donc une couleur édition reliée limitée livre il est conyeying le sentiment du monde à ce moment de convivialité.
Et .. .. NOUS AVONS BESOIN DE VOTRE AIDE ☺☺☺
Mon ami est un professeur de collège de la conception graphique et un dessinateur aussi, et je .. .. et mes talents se trouvent dans l'organisation du talent des autres (si ce est un talent). Mon arrière-plan est la stratégie commerciale et marketing et je ai travaillé sur divers projets comme celui-ci dans ma vie et tous ont été couronnés de succès, y compris la collecte de fonds pour Tchernobyl pour enfants organismes de bienfaisance et d'aider à élever € 30k pour une opération de vue de l'économie en Chine pour une jeune fille. Je suis propriétaire d'une entreprise ne peut donc consacrer tout le temps je ai besoin de cela et ne ai aucun doute que ce sera un énorme succès.
Il ya quelques grands avantages (Est-ce toujours le jargon? .. .. Avantages) pour le don, il est donc vraiment à vous, je suis prêt à mettre les heures si vous êtes prêt à mettre quelques euros.
Les profits vont aller aux familles du massacre de Charlie Hebdo avec un peu mis de côté au profit de quelques CHARITÉS de la liberté d'expression. Voyons quelques bonnes au moins sortir de cette folie incomprehendible et de montrer le mal que nous allons poursuivre, je vous remercie à l'avance.
#JeSuisCharlie
Christopher Duffy
01/08/2015

story:
I am a senior in the International Baccalaureate Program at Vanguard High School in Ocala, FL who is looking for different artists to donate/paint/present art for a fundraiser at the Brick City Center for the Arts.  It would be wonderful to be able to auction off your art for the Pediatric Cancer Foundation (fastercure.org) and also spread the awareness of the importance of art in local communities.  

After dealing with a young neighbor faced with a rare form of leukemia, I felt compelled to not only aid her, but also raise money and awareness of pediatric cancer through something creative, refreshing, and also important to a growing community. Art is the sort of subject that unites people together, and an auction/fundraiser of some sort in a gallery brings that even closer.

Any contribution that you make would honestly do so much. It would go towards funding hospitals and different treatments in developing countries, medicine research, and bettering the lives of children dealing with cancer. I want to make cancer easier to handle, and this will honestly be the key - implementing creativity.

story:
Hi,

My name is Katie lee, I am an artist / maker working very hard to bring my creations to the public.  In 2014 I founded Silueta Designs, with a mission to create functional art.  Work which 'tells a story' and draws our attention to the beauty and quality of sustainable materials. Please see the images of my lamps on the gallery page.

'Silueta' lamps are handcrafted using reclaimed wood and 100% recycled 'Ellie Poo' paper . I use traditional painting techniques and silhouette art to create a narrative which is only revealed when the lamp is illuminated. I have developed a unique process which does not allow the silhouette to be seen, even when you look inside the shade, until the lamp is switched on.   The paintings on the shades are all original and each 'artwork' is backed and hand - stitched together.

I have just been given the opportunity to exhibit work at my first design fair but I don't have the capital to buy the materials needed!

Raising £500 will fund the materials for 20 lamps, (recycled paper, paints, inks, lamp fitting and cables).  If I don't reach my goal - I will use the funds I do get to make as many lamps as I can!

I can exhibit and sell the finsihed lamps at the acclaimed Cornwall Design Fair in August 2015, in turn raising my profile and enough money to kickstart my business.  The fair attracts over thousands of visitors each year, has excellent links to industry and hosts the Guild of Ten’s Innovation in Design and Making Award.  

I feel confident that I will be succesful at the design fair as the small number of lamps I have already made have received excellent feedback and secured sales. I just need help to get to a bigger showcase.

With your help I will be able to use this fantastic opportunity to exhibit and sell my lamps alongside acclaimed designers.  This will be my chance to establish my craft business and future development as an artist/maker.

My longer term plan includes offering workshops to the local community, which support making with sustainable materials and exploring expressive painting techniques.  I would like to establish 'Silueta Designs' as a company that engages with the community and shares creative skills.

Thank you for taking this time to read my proposal, if you can't contribute financially it would be fantastic if you could indiegogo share and spread the word to others that might be able to.

many thanks,

Katie Lee

Below is an example of a one of the PERKS I am offering, for just £15 you will get a limited edition A4 print of one of my illustrations.

story:
The Gingerbread House Burningman Theme Camp!

The Gingerbread House Burningman Theme Camp is exactly what it sounds like, a life-size gingerbread house full of gingers in the desert :-)  There will also be a gingification station for non-gingers who would like red hair and freckles applied.  For authentic gingers, we will have a sunblock station consisting of lotion massages, and spray on stencil body art, as well as tan line reversal procedures.  The Ginger Hall of Fame will feature famous gingers through-out time (Mark Twain, Lucy, Thomas Jefferson, Shawn White, Conan, Galileo, Carol Burnett, elmo...).  The Ginger Bar will be serving a variety of delicious ginger treats, like gingerbread men, ginger beer, gingerbread, ginger snaps, ginger chews, ginger ale, ginger tea, ginger whiskey, and red-hots... I think you get it...  The magnitude of this contribution is, well, priceless :-)


Funds will go toward the materials and creation of the gingerbread house at Burningman 2015 (based on a carport frame with painted plywood walls), as well as giant candy-canes, gum-drops and lollipops, and and a human sized gingerbread man for the front yard.  To do it right will take at least $2,000, although it could be pulled off in a reasonable way for less...  Thanks for your help in making this happen.  It is sure to bring some smiles to the world :-)


The theme camp team, lead by Jason Mallory and Sara Cox, is a group of experienced Burners with every physical ability to pull this off, except for the funds to do it the way it should be done...  Thanks for contributing!
